snippet: The company said total revenue fell to $911.5 million from $1.03 billion for the quarter that ended Nov. 1.
abstract: Abercrombie & Fitch lowers its full-year earnings forecast and reports total revenue fell to $911.5 million from $1.03 billion for quarter that ended Nov 1.
lead_paragraph: The company said total revenue fell to $911.5 million from $1.03 billion for the quarter that ended Nov. 1.

headline.main: Sales and Forecast Fall at Abercrombie & Fitch
headline.print_headline: Sales and Forecast Fall at Abercrombie & Fitch
